languages.text: "Страже поручено очистить место празднества от лишившихся домов погорельцев и покалеченных — их принудительно вывозят на промышленные ярусы. Не сомневаюсь, что к началу торжества все раны столицы будут пусть не исцелены, но надежно спрятаны под гримом декораций".

"The wardens have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."
languages.original_text: "Страже поручено очистить место празднества от лишившихся домов погорельцев и покалеченных — их принудительно вывозят на промышленные ярусы. Не сомневаюсь, что к началу торжества все раны столицы будут пусть не исцелены, но надежно спрятаны под гримом декораций".

traits.locale_text: "The guards have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."

"The guards have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."

"The guards have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."

"The wardens have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."

languages.text: 「ワーデンは、式典会場の負傷者と、家から焼け出された人々の片付けを進めています。産業レベルでの強制退去になる予定です。ご安心ください、祝祭の開始までに首都の傷跡は癒やされないまでも、入念に飾り付けて隠しますので」
languages.original_text: "The wardens have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."

traits.locale_text: 「ワーデンは、式典会場の負傷者と、家から焼け出された人々の片付けを進めています。産業レベルでの強制退去になる予定です。ご安心ください、祝祭の開始までに首都の傷跡は癒やされないまでも、入念に飾り付けて隠しますので」

languages.text: “首都的守卫已经得到了命令，要把庆典场地的所有伤员和无家可归的人都赶走，把他们全都赶到工业区。请您放心，到了庆典当日，即便首都的伤痕依然未能愈合，它们也会被花团锦簇的布景遮蔽得严严实实，绝不会让任何人看见。”
languages.original_text: "The wardens have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."

traits.locale_text: “首都的守卫已经得到了命令，要把庆典场地的所有伤员和无家可归的人都赶走，把他们全都赶到工业区。请您放心，到了庆典当日，即便首都的伤痕依然未能愈合，它们也会被花团锦簇的布景遮蔽得严严实实，绝不会让任何人看见。”

languages.text: «Los guardias han recibido la tarea de despejar el recinto de la ceremonia, trasladando a los heridos y a aquellos cuyos hogares han ardido a los niveles industriales. No tema: para cuando empiecen los festejos las heridas de la capital estarán, si no sanadas, por lo menos bien tapadas por los vendajes».
languages.original_text: "The wardens have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."

traits.locale_text: «Los guardias han recibido la tarea de despejar el recinto de la ceremonia, trasladando a los heridos y a aquellos cuyos hogares han ardido a los niveles industriales. No tema: para cuando empiecen los festejos las heridas de la capital estarán, si no sanadas, por lo menos bien tapadas por los vendajes».

languages.text: « Quant à ceux qui avaient trouvé refuge dans la salle de cérémonie, soit parce qu'ils avaient subi des blessures graves, soit parce qu'ils avaient perdu leur logement lors des affrontements, les gardiens ont été chargés de les reléguer aux niveaux industriels. Je peux vous assurer que quand les festivités commenceront, les blessures de la capitale seront guéries, tout du moins en surface. »
languages.original_text: "The wardens have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à ceux qui avaient trouvé refuge dans la salle de cérémonie, soit parce qu'ils avaient subi des blessures graves, soit parce qu'ils avaient perdu leur logement lors des affrontements, les gardiens ont été chargés de les reléguer aux niveaux industriels. Je peux vous assurer que quand les festivités commenceront, les blessures de la capitale seront guéries, tout du moins en surface. »

languages.text: "Die Wächter sollen den Veranstaltungsort der Zeremonie von Verwundeten und durch Brand Vertriebenen räumen – sie werden gewaltsam in die Industrieebenen gebracht. Seid versichert, zum Beginn der Feierlichkeiten werden die Wunden der Hauptstadt zwar nicht geheilt, aber wenigstens unter aufwendigen Dekorationen verborgen sein."
languages.original_text: "The wardens have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."

traits.locale_text: "Die Wächter sollen den Veranstaltungsort der Zeremonie von Verwundeten und durch Brand Vertriebenen räumen – sie werden gewaltsam in die Industrieebenen gebracht. Seid versichert, zum Beginn der Feierlichkeiten werden die Wunden der Hauptstadt zwar nicht geheilt, aber wenigstens unter aufwendigen Dekorationen verborgen sein."

languages.text: "Dizdarlar; yaralılar ve evleri yakılanlar cebren sanayi sitelerine taşındıktan sonra merasim alanlarını temizlemekle görevlendirildi. İçiniz rahat olsun... Başkentin yaraları, şenlikler başlayana kadar iyileşmese de özenle hazırlanmış dekorların altına gizlenecek."
languages.original_text: "The wardens have been tasked with clearing the ceremony venue of the injured and those who were burned out of their houses — they will be forcibly moved to the industrial levels. Rest assured, by the start of the festivities, the capital's wounds will be, if not healed, then well hidden under elaborate set dressing."

traits.locale_text: "Muhafızlar, yaralıların ve evleri yakılanların cebren sanayi sitelerine taşındıktan sonra merasim alanlarını temizlemekle görevlendirildi. İçiniz rahat olsun, başkentin yaraları şenliklerin başlayana kadar iyileşmese de özenle hazırlanmış dekorların altına gizlenmiş olacak."
